translations: 使丧失能力，使伤残；使无效，使不能运转；使无资格

sentences.sentence: They can disable communications satellites and shut down power systems.
sentences.translation: 它们能使通信卫星失效并关闭电力系统。

sentences.sentence: There will be television chat shows hosted by robots, and cars with pollution monitors that will disable them when they offend.
sentences.translation: 届时，将出现由机器人主持的电视谈话节目以及装有污染监控器的汽车，一旦这些汽车排污超标（违规），监控器就会使其停驶。
